ai-patthana18.1:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings,)
ai-patthana18.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
ai-patthana18.1:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.1:2.1_1: For the sake of cause, not for the sake of causeuity.
ai-patthana18.1:3.1_0: Or for the sake of cause or reason, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.1:4.1_0: For the sake of based on unity ...
ai-patthana18.1:5.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of thought, not for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.1:6.1_0: He doesn’t proceed having no support for the five reasons:
ai-patthana18.1:6.1_1: between one shoulder and the next ...
ai-patthana18.1:8.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.1:9.1_0: For the sake of cause, what is the reason for the sake of the teaching, not for the sake of a reason.
ai-patthana18.1:9.1_1: Nor is the cause or condition for the reason.
ai-patthana18.1:9.1_2: Nor is the cause or reason for the sake of a reason for the sake of nation.
ai-patthana18.1:10.1_0: It’s not the reason for the sake of deceiving, nor for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.1:10.1_1: for the sake of deference, not for the sake of a reason.
ai-patthana18.1:10.1_2: It’s not the reason for the sake of deference, or for the sake of a reason.
ai-patthana18.1:11.1_0: Not for the sake of cause or condition for the sake of deceiving, they didn’t for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.1:11.1_1: Not for the sake of cause or condition for the sake of cause, what is the reason for the sake of the teaching, for the sake of nourishes.
ai-patthana18.1:12.1_3: (This should be expanded in detail as in the chapter.)
ai-patthana18.1:13.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of cause or reason.
ai-patthana18.1:14.1_0: Not cause or reason for the sake of a cause, the reason for the sake of cause, the reason why the three conditions are causes and reasons.
